title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. L, pt. 82 - Health Systems Agencies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. L, pt. 82 - Health Systems Agencies

State Regulations

Subpart 82-1 - Organization And Functions Of Health Systems Agencies (§ 82-1.1 to 82-1.6)

Subpart 82-2 - State Funding For Health Systems Agencies (§ 82-2.1 to 82-2.6 to 82-2.7)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. L, pt. 82

Statutory authority: Public Health Law, §§ 576, 2164, 2500-a, 2522 [6], 2528, 2904, 2904[c], 2904-b, 3612[6], 4175; Social Services

Law, §§ 364[2], 365-a

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
